name: Pong-Out
description:
Welcome to Pong-Out! Pong-Out is a mix of two classic arcade titles, Pong and Breakout for the Atari. Try your best to play Pong against the computer while playing breakout for 15 levels! Have Fun!

Credits:

GMWorks for help with Breakout

BGM: Rhinoceros by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Made for Mini Ludum Dare #67

Controls:

Move Pong Up: Up Arrow

Move Pong Down: Down Arrow

Move Breakout Left: Left Arrow

Move Breakout Right: Right Arrow

Release Ball: Spacebar
